foods.name: Masala Egg curry, Yellow Dal Tadka, Paratha Thali
foods.description: Want a meal that's nutritious yet light on your stomach? This thali of egg curry, dal tadka, and soft whole wheat parathas, served with cucumber carrot salad, sirka onions that's packed with deliciousness.

foods.name: Yellow Dal Tadka, Aloo Gobhi, Paratha Thali
foods.description: Relish the simple yet beautiful flavors of our homestyle yellow dal tadka and aloo gobhi adraki in this thali. To savor these mains, thereâ€™s our soft and fresh whole wheat parathas.

foods.name: Veg Biryani with Raita
foods.description: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with mixed vegetables, herbs, and spices, served with a side of cooling raita.

foods.name: Chicken Tikka Masala with Naan
foods.description: Tender chicken pieces marinated and cooked in a rich, creamy tomato-based sauce, served with soft and fluffy naan bread.

foods.name: Spinach and Feta Stuffed Chicken Breast
foods.description: Juicy chicken breast stuffed with spinach and feta, roasted to perfection. Served with a side of roasted vegetables.

foods.name: Mango Coconut Rice Bowl
foods.description: Fluffy coconut rice topped with fresh mango chunks, avocado slices, and a drizzle of tangy mango dressing.

foods.name: Shrimp and Broccoli Stir-Fry
foods.description: Tender shrimp and crisp broccoli stir-fried in a savory sauce, served over steamed jasmine rice.

foods.name: Quinoa Salad with Roasted Vegetables
foods.description: A colorful and nutritious salad featuring quinoa, roasted vegetables, and a zesty lemon vinaigrette.

foods.name: Beef and Mushroom Stroganoff
foods.description: Tender strips of beef and mushrooms cooked in a creamy and flavorful stroganoff sauce, served over egg noodles.

foods.name: Avocado and Black Bean Wrap
foods.description: A satisfying wrap filled with creamy avocado, black beans, tomatoes, and a spicy chipotle mayo.

foods.name: Salmon Caesar Salad
foods.description: Grilled salmon fillet served on a bed of crisp romaine lettuce, tossed with Caesar dressing and croutons.

foods.name: Pesto Pasta with Cherry Tomatoes
foods.description: Al dente pasta tossed in a vibrant pesto sauce, topped with sweet cherry tomatoes and Parmesan cheese.

foods.name: Chickpea and Spinach Curry
foods.description: Hearty chickpea and spinach curry simmered in a fragrant blend of spices, served with basmati rice.

foods.name: Turkey and Cranberry Wrap
foods.description: Sliced turkey breast, cranberry sauce, and stuffing wrapped in a tortilla for a festive and satisfying meal.

foods.name: Caprese Salad with Balsamic Glaze
foods.description: A classic Italian salad featuring fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil drizzled with balsamic glaze.

foods.name: Pulled Pork Sandwich
foods.description: Slow-cooked pulled pork piled high on a soft bun, topped with coleslaw and barbecue sauce.

foods.name: Vegetable Pad Thai
foods.description: Stir-fried rice noodles with tofu, vegetables, and a tangy tamarind sauce, garnished with peanuts and cilantro.

foods.name: Mushroom Risotto
foods.description: Creamy and flavorful risotto made with Arborio rice, mushrooms, and Parmesan cheese.

foods.name: Honey Glazed Salmon
foods.description: Grilled salmon fillet glazed with a sweet and savory honey glaze, served with roasted vegetables.

foods.name: Vegetarian Burrito Bowl
foods.description: A hearty bowl featuring rice, black beans, corn, avocado, and salsa, topped with cheese and sour cream.

foods.name: Teriyaki Chicken Skewers
foods.description: Juicy chicken skewers marinated in teriyaki sauce and grilled to perfection, served with steamed rice.

foods.name: Eggplant Parmesan
foods.description: Slices of eggplant breaded and baked, topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese.

foods.name: Lemon Herb Grilled Chicken
foods.description: Grilled chicken breast marinated in a zesty lemon herb sauce, served with roasted vegetables.

foods.name: Vegetable Sushi Rolls
foods.description: Assorted vegetable sushi rolls with avocado, cucumber, and carrots, served with soy sauce and pickled ginger.

foods.name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
foods.description: Thin-crust pizza topped with barbecue chicken, red onions, and cilantro, drizzled with barbecue sauce.

foods.name: Mango Avocado Salsa Chicken
foods.description: Grilled chicken breast topped with a refreshing mango avocado salsa, served with quinoa.

foods.name: Cauliflower Buffalo Wings
foods.description: Crispy baked cauliflower florets coated in spicy buffalo sauce, served with vegan ranch dip.

foods.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
foods.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with spaghetti, bacon, eggs, and Parmesan cheese in a creamy sauce.

foods.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
foods.description: Bell peppers stuffed with a flavorful mixture of quinoa, black beans, corn, and spices, baked to perfection.

foods.name: Chocolate Banana Smoothie Bowl
foods.description: A delicious and indulgent smoothie bowl made with banana, cocoa powder, and topped with granola and chocolate chips.
